channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Sunken and loose drain cover causing excess noise and vibration, 6th May
item.description:
All the drains along Finlay way need to be strengthened/changed or repaired and are not suitable for the volume and type of traffic

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Bramble Chase, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Recently dug trench is deteriating, 6th May
item.description:

item.title: May be causing damage to vehicle suspension and lead to a sunken drain cover, 6th May
item.description:
Between Blackberry Grove and the Cloisters on the main road and is causing excessive noise.

item.title: TMC - Defects - Footways Slabs problem, 6th May
item.description:
28 day with give an take plus temporary footway closure needed please replace x1 broken sunken 900x600x20mm slab (FW Broken Slabs)

item.title: TMC - Defects - Vegetation problem, 6th May
item.description:
28 day with give an take plus temporary footway/cycleway closure needed please cut back overgrown hedge an vegetation growing out into footway back to boundary appropriately 3 meters x2 meters (Overgrown Hedge)

item.title: Sign at eastern end of Stoke Orchard footpath 15 (ASO 15) has broken off, 5th May
item.description:
The sign at the eastern end of Stoke Orchard footpath 15 (ASO 15) has broken off. Apologies for the slightly unclear picture. Part of the sign is still connected to the post using a jubilee clip, but most of the sign has broken off.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Stoke Road, Stoke Orchard, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Sign at northern end of Prestbury footpath 13 (CHP 13) is pointing in the wrong direction, 5th May
item.description:
The sign for Prestbury footpath (CHP 13) is pointing in the wrong direction. It is pointing towards the east, perhaps as it has been blown by strong wind. It should point southwest (i.e. up the stairs through the churchyard). The issue has been present since late March if not earlier.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Mill Street, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:
This path is generally easy to follow but even in dry weather this short section is in very poor condition. It maybe that some steps need to be created down this short section of bank to improve itâ€™s safety for users? Https://www.findmystreet.co.uk/map?usrn=40104135

item.title: Several potholes in this location, 5th May
item.description:
Between North hill house & Green gables are several holes. Also outside Glan Nant house, next door to Green Gables. These have been filled in previous years & are reoccurring annually, so most enduring solution is to resurface this section of road.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Parton Road, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
